title: Vase, 1939-24-5, 1902
creditline: Gift of Mrs. C. R. Dumble
description: Small ovoid vase with circular base, slender neck with outcurved lip, and two quadrant handles attached to shoulder of neck.  Banded decoration about shoulder of gilding and color, encrusted with random pattern of fused particles of glass in various colors.  Gilding on base, handles and lip.
